title: How Many Updates Is Too Many for Live Service?
author: community-lead
content: We plan to ship seasonal drops plus monthly balance passes. From your perspective, what cadence feels healthy before fatigue sets in?

title: Co-op Difficulty Scaling — What Works Best?
author: gameplay-pm
content: We’re testing encounter scaling by party skill, not just size. Would you prefer smarter AI, more mechanics, or straightforward stat bumps?

title: Preferred Anti-Cheat Signals to Show Players
author: player-safety
content: We already act on server-side detections. Would visible ban waves, post-match flags, or periodic integrity reports build the most trust?

title: Season Pass: Cosmetics-Only or Light Boosts?
author: monetization
content: We’re debating a cosmetics-only pass versus adding small XP boosts. What keeps the pass fair while funding new content?

title: Controller vs KB/M Balance for Competitive Modes
author: input-systems
content: We’re iterating on aim assist curves and recoil patterns. What feels fair in mixed-input lobbies without fragmenting queues?
